comments: I liked the game so much. No! I love it, but it's just that I'm now on level 65 but I'm stucked since I only have few gems left and I needed to extend the time, and buy some customers which I find amazing just to save your energy and the stage but I also find it hard since I have already completed 3 stars from lower levels and why is it that I can't play the levels I have already completed? I would really suggest that lower levels would still be played just to be able to collect gems. I hope you can fix this issue though. I'm so loving this game and I'm getting addicted to it. I got stucked on level 65 on my two days of playing. Thank you

Moving on is hard on some levels because they are specifically designed for you to use gems and they are hard to come by. However, If you are patient enough you can eventually earn them. I enjoy that you don't have to drag the items to the customers. It's definitely an enjoyable and challenging game. I'm currently at a "coming soon" stage where I can no longer move ahead. I've been waiting a long time and do not want to wait forever. Please do an update soon!!!

It's fun till you run out of energy. They get you too rate the game right away while you are having fun with free lives. Give you enough lives to rate it good then the lives end and you have to watch a min advert or 30 mins for one life Regen. OR PAY. They just want your money at that point. So sad.

I love this game! So few games actually suck me in, but this game had me addicted right away. I play on my phone and laptop. Yes I have two different games at different levels lol. I love how upgrades are so easy and it isn't impossible to upgrade or move on. It gets challenging as you go up levels but it's so fun.

Brilliant little time waster of a game.. yet.. once you start getting to the higher levels.. the less chance of earning gems and i aint noway paying for them.. last time I stupidly paid for gems on cooking fever..and got my account hacked into! Big lesson learnt! I do still play this alot tho so overall, definitely a good game. 👍

Some levels are nearly impossible to beat without help. Also I dislike that if you're about to lose due to food burning or an angry customer that there's no additional warning until it's too late. Then you have to sit there and stare at your warning till your level is lost and over. Other than those 2 things I greatly enjoy playing.
description: PREPARE 🔪, COOK 🕑and SERVE 🍕 delicious meals from all over the world 🌎 in Cooking Madness!  Become the master chef 👨‍🍳 you have always wanted to be! This year it’s this highly addictive time management game that’ll bring you the best digital cooking experience!  Get yourself in a real cooking craze. Cook like you’re a MAD CHEF in Cooking Madness! Did the cooking fever caught on and you can’t get enough of 🍨 cooking games? Then this is THE cooking game for you! You’ll be serving delicious dishes 🍩 to hungry customers in amazing restaurants in a ⏩ FAST pace. No challenge that can’t be beaten by you. Dash from restaurant to restaurant on this magical map. You will discover and unlock many places as you progress on your journey. 🌄 Get the restaurants back to business and attract more and more customers. Let the Cooking Madness begin! Practice your cooking techniques and management skills 🍽. Tap as fast as you can while keeping your eye on the time. Making dishes have never been so much fun and exciting! Try all the possible kitchen appliances 🍳 to improve your cooking abilities. Upgrade dishes and kitchenware for a better gaming experience!  Love a little bit of a thrill in your cooking game? comments: I felt like this be could have so much potential! I thought that the different colours gave you the ability to collect more balls so not really sure what the point of the game is... no way to won or lose ... just click ... I like things with skill... I can handle the ads and would even pay to remove ads if the game have a point.. a purpose a win/lose sort of deal but it's not I don't think I will be keeping this game .. unless they add a little skill to it

This isn't a game. You just hold a button until it disappears and then hold another button... Really. And then there is an option to just have the buttons automatically hold themselves. Then the next level happens and there are new colors, but nothing else is different. Maybe good to keep your baby busy but I wouldn't condone that sort of thing

It's decent. I like the sounds it makes, and the colours look nice too. The forced ads I can't skip after 5 seconds is the annoying part. I get that you need ads, but come on man. I buy 3 upgrades and have to watch a full minute ad. It's like an ad simulator. Honestly if I wanted to play with balls, and watch ads I'd play with my own balls, and throw some ads on YouTube(this part is mostly for humour). Just so you know I'm not salty, annoyed yes, but not salty.

I like the game as it's one when you don't want to think but want to do something. It's very easy. However you watch more ads than you do play the game. So annoying I had to sit through a 1 minute cat chat advert without being able to skip it. Then a 10 second level then another 50 second unskipable ad so annoying

Ads are non skipable which is awful. Skippable ads are ones that pop up that you don't want usually. The full ads like on this game are only usually shown when you are getting a upgrade to a boost or something free etc. Terrible design as you can't win either

I love a stupid game, I really do, not everything has to be top tier strategy or reflex based or whatever  However this is the most boring clicker game ever. At least normal clickers have a theme or SOMETHING to pretend you're doing... Anything at all. Here, you don't even have that. No context, no theme, not even a change of shape or whatever  It's sad gaming has gone this low

comments: Oh my gosh. This game is one of the best. It literally like a normal school. You jave schedules. You can do ballet class, hip hop class, latina class and finally jazz class. You can go to diffrent places to get outfit,makeup and hair done. They actually give you a report card with all your classsess and grade. You can peform in front of an audience and you can battle people at the battle arena. Finally my favorite part of this game BOY DRAMA AND GIRL DRAMA it's amazing. DOWNLOAD THIS GAME RIGHT NOW!!!!!!!!!

I love the quality of the game. Great time killer.Brings out my inner Ballerina lol. Easy, Fun.Game The only thing so far i dont like is wadrobe. For example If your swiching btwn classess its hard to complety take off i.e jacket, tights or pants from previous classes. If u pick certain outfits there stuck on you. Please fix. Other then that good game.

I'm not much of a dance gamer but I love simulation games. This one in particular is very innovative with their design and gameplay. I was skeptical of how I was going to like it at first but it proved me wrong and I immediately took to it. The controls are easy to learn and I don't even mind all of the ads. Honestly, a really great game.

I love this game! It is really fun and if you like dancing then this is the one for you! Personally I like gymnastics more but that's because I've come a long way in it. The only thing that you could change is the amount of ads are! There are so many of them! But over all this game is great! 😉😉

Honestly, one of the best games that I ever played. Dont care much for the ads. Just turn off your data and none of the ads will come out😉 But just like what the other reviewers are saying, the option to choose and take off certain clothes are limited. But other than that, great game.

This game is glitchy, the story line is inconsitent, you have to always keep watching ads. On top of that you rehearse multiple times and it doesnt tell you have to get an a. I picked ballet and forced me to do hip hop for season 2. I tried to like it, but it's glitches before the dance perfomance how am I supposed to remeber the routine when i watch multiple ads and do routines that are not ment to be for the perfomance. Idk if its glitch ir a bug but it's just really bad. It is a cute game. Just not consistent.

description: The cold winds brings chimes of joy and blessing because a new and royal life is about to be born into this world pretty soon!!! The queen of the kingdom, located someplace far away, in the land of snow and the power of ice is pregnant with her first child and could be expecting the baby any time soon and will claim the tittle of ice mommy very soon as well!!!To serve the royalty, the kingdom needs the best of everything!! Similarly, the kingdom is in search for the best and the most experienced gynecologist, nurse and the doctor!! Your clinic and hospital have been advised best for this activity because the queen trusts you the most!!! Soon witness, the miracle of life in the land of snow!! Since ice mommy is in her critical stage of pregnancy, she might need to come to the hospital any time soon, so you must be prepared for operation with your surgical instruments at all times!!! Ice mommy also has to prepare a feast for the celebration of the coming of her baby!!! Make sure to conduct a safe and healthy surgery of the ice mommy pregnant princess and no complications must occur!!! Before the preparations one day, mommy starts feeling sick and that kind of sickness meant it is time to go for surgery now and immediately too for that matter!!! Drive immediately to the surgery hospital the moment she falls sick!!Once in the hospital, perform all the necessary body assessments for ice mommy!! For example, give her oxygen to breathe properly, then check her blood level and give her blood. Then comes testing the temperature to see how well she is to undergo surgery!! Next step includes taking ultrasound, and after some time it is emergency surgery time for ice mommy!!! Before the cesarean operation officially begins give ice mommy a good anesthesia medicine and then slowly start cutting the stomach area. Get the baby out and then clean the mark after stitching up the stomach!! Then when you have cleaned the baby, give it to mommy so it is mommy and baby together at last!!!Please the kingdom and the land of snow by rescuing ice mommy and baby during the pregnancy surgery emergency operation!!! ||| HOW TO PLAY ||| •	Begin the operation game play  •	Select the ice mommy you want to operate •	Multiple scenes; play one by one to select level •	Follow the hand indicator instructions on screen and perform the tasks •	Take temperature •	Blood test •	Put on Oxygen mask •	Give anesthesia  •	Check ultrasound •	Cut stomach •	Perform cesarean surgery•	Get baby out •	Stitch the cut mark •	Clean baby and give to mommy •	Enjoy with baby and show to the entire snow land and kingdom Thank you for rescuing mommy and baby!!
descriptionHTML:
The cold winds brings chimes of joy and blessing because a new and royal life is about to be born into this world pretty soon!!! The queen of the kingdom, located someplace far away, in the land of snow and the power of ice is pregnant with her first child and could be expecting the baby any time soon and will claim the tittle of ice mommy very soon as well!!!

To serve the royalty, the kingdom needs the best of everything!! Similarly, the kingdom is in search for the best and the most experienced gynecologist, nurse and the doctor!!
Your clinic and hospital have been advised best for this activity because the queen trusts you the most!!! Soon witness, the miracle of life in the land of snow!!

Since ice mommy is in her critical stage of pregnancy, she might need to come to the hospital any time soon, so you must be prepared for operation with your surgical instruments at all times!!! Ice mommy also has to prepare a feast for the celebration of the coming of her baby!!!

Make sure to conduct a safe and healthy surgery of the ice mommy pregnant princess and no complications must occur!!!
Before the preparations one day, mommy starts feeling sick and that kind of sickness meant it is time to go for surgery now and immediately too for that matter!!! Drive immediately to the surgery hospital the moment she falls sick!!

Once in the hospital, perform all the necessary body assessments for ice mommy!! For example, give her oxygen to breathe properly, then check her blood level and give her blood. Then comes testing the temperature to see how well she is to undergo surgery!!
Next step includes taking ultrasound, and after some time it is emergency surgery time for ice mommy!!! Before the cesarean operation officially begins give ice mommy a good anesthesia medicine and then slowly start cutting the stomach area.

Get the baby out and then clean the mark after stitching up the stomach!! Then when you have cleaned the baby, give it to mommy so it is mommy and baby together at last!!!
Please the kingdom and the land of snow by rescuing ice mommy and baby during the pregnancy surgery emergency operation!!!

||| HOW TO PLAY |||
• Begin the operation game play
• Select the ice mommy you want to operate
• Multiple scenes; play one by one to select level
• Follow the hand indicator instructions on screen and perform the tasks
• Take temperature
• Blood test
• Put on Oxygen mask
• Give anesthesia
• Check ultrasound
• Cut stomach
• Perform cesarean surgery
• Get baby out
• Stitch the cut mark
• Clean baby and give to mommy
• Enjoy with baby and show to the entire snow land and kingdom
Thank you for rescuing mommy and baby!!
developerAddress: MANAMA, BAHRAIN
summary: The queen of ice, in the land of snow, needs your help in her pregnancy surgery!
title: Snow Queen Mommy Surgery

comments: Guys this game is the best offline game I have ever played as it is toooooo much addictive. U would not believe me, firstly u would die very easily but as u play on then it would be easy to create high score. It also makes your reflexes more faster. The creators have done a great work. And people who are saying there are lots of adds are talking rubbish.  Play it!!!!!

Want to play an ad? Download this game and you'll get to experience all the thrills of pop up ads between brief stints of playing the game you thought you downloaded instead of the ads. There is at least two ads per game. Some of the ads go landscape to further increase game play pleasure, X one out and Bam! Bonus round go straight to the app store to see the ad you X'ed out available for download. Go back and BAM try the X again YOU GO BACK TO THE SAME PLACE. Good times were had played ten games and uninstalled. ADWARE ten millions downloaded how many kept it longer than twenty minutes.

It's so fun with all the different types of patterns.im telling you its the best game you will play in your life.When I die it's actually quite good, because the last time I did had 100 to spend and when I had passed the next 4 rounds I had 10,000 to spend so you should realy get this game,and Change your life people.Plus the new thing is the star block makes you invincible for a short amount of time for example I was going when I had 93 and I went in 24 star and I Could go through 100 and 123,000 for 1 minute. Anyway great game if you liked my review go onto Episode to see that review. Hope you love the game. Oh and I forgot to tell you a list of all the patterns we have purple, green,rainbow,pink,🍔,💵,🚗 and grey.

It's a very fun game with so much to offer, the snake colors are very funny and colorful, but one thing I do not like is that there are SO many ads! When you simply try to restart a game it makes ANOTHER ad pop up for the 35 time. Please fix this issue.

Nice concept, nice controls, the problem is that is too much randomnes and less skill. It forces me in corners where I'm definitely dead or the good boxes are in corners where i can't go because of the walls and that also means im dead. Please make it less random or ar least make that if i comith to a path and because of the game i cant chage is, at least dont make the first mistake ista death.

It's to many ads like beyond the amount I've seen on any other app. You lose a life then there a 30 sec ad after every time you lose a life. When the ads over you jump right back into the game. Making it difficult to play because it doesn't give you enough time to make your next move. If they remove the ads may it would be a better game.

comments: Game is fun until you get so far and can no longer upgrade to compete.  I have all stars in amateur league, yet on achievement rewards it shows I only have 1 star.  This is a problem to try to earn stars to purchase higher end cars, you can't without spending money.  Should be anle to earn all cars if you play regularly withput spending money.

Nice game at first, my gf got angry at some point because I played it the whole time. However, I soon started playing less and less, because winning just became impossible. I respect the developers, but I wont pay to max out a cars modifications just to race that same car which is twice as fast. How does that work? Are the AI cars getting modifications from a different game?

People have low requirements nowadays. This game doesn't deserve a 4.4 rating. It feels good as long as I stay in the menu (even with the weird japanese mascot) but once the game loads it gets horrible. The camera angles are terrible, the cars feel like toys in the overscaled world, the car's softshadow is terribly aligned and the physics simulation is just mediocre. The whole game is just a mediocre clone of Asphalt 8, I don't understand why people choose an inferior copy instead of the original one...

So many ad's, there back to back ad's. When I am finally able to select a race, guess what...another ad pops up and takes me to the play store to download it. I go back to the game and I gotta start all over again from the first screen. Ad's ad's ad's I was only able to play on the first day I downloaded it, after that..... Ad's ad's ad's                    "AD'S!!!".... But i did like the game when I played it

It's good. But could you please add an "are you sure you want to finish repair dialog box?" I have wasted too many diamonds. You can even make it option (from the settings) for those who wouldn't like it.

Good time waster. Especially well made in the beginning levels, but quickly becomes pay to win, as diamonds are not easily attainable and neither are coins, not to mention that later cars are very high prices and require much dedication to acquire. Controls are nice, but like with money, get worse with time. Maps are not optimized for later leveled cars, making some corners physically impossible to make even when drifting at full tilt, forcing the player to adapt to a combination of drifting, boosting and then braking to get around a bend without crashing. Otherwise, it is a very nice game for being free, although there are many ads, but that's excusable as it is a free game. I would recommend it, just not as a long term type of game.

comments: Very similar to the old one This is great, but still isnt the same as the original Space Impact. I remember the original had different levels that you progressed through and destructible environments if I remember correctly. If anybody knows where to find the original without having to buy an old Nokia phone, please contact me.

The controls break the game I used to spend tons of time playing space impact on an old Nokia, so I used to enjoy it. This version, though, makes controlling the space ship a problem. The controls lack precision, even at level 1 the opponents are too good and I'm not exactly a beginner. I tried reducing the sensitivity, to no avail. I wish we could've chosen between joystick and keys...it might have made the game better .

Okay. First of all, to the guys complaining about the controls i have one thing to say. Git Gud plebs.  And as for the developer of the game, some of the enemies are acting strange. On the original, some of them should be in groups. And when did rockets shoot lasers?? Hahaha! Anyway, great game. You might want to improve the AI though.

If the control is hard, wait for others to get shot down, then pause and resume to activate invisibility. Invisibility means to protect and pass the spaceship through enemies. Pls turn off the screen effects to prevent darkness from escaping. Thank you.☺☺☺☺👍👍👍👍
I hate the control Its very similar to space impact but na navigator style control is hard. Yes its  so hard to use. If you didnt hit exactly that black circle it wouldnt work. Arrr. 😧😧
Hard to play Control is broken. I have 3 lives  left when i die the 3 life is gone.
description: ARE YOU READY TO LIVE AGAIN THE MAGIC OF NOKIA 3310? Choose a Spaceship and get ready to face your next target. descriptionHTML:
ARE YOU READY TO LIVE AGAIN THE MAGIC OF NOKIA 3310?

Choose a Spaceship and get ready to face your next target. Destroy enemies ships and defeat the cruel bosses: only you can save the Galaxy!
Don't forget to collect coins to unlock new spaceships.

Inspired by the famous game “Space Impact”, Space Squids is an endless shooter made by dousi96 (Simone Dosi), completely free and always improving.

The game is produced by Bolopix and powered by Unity 5.

New improvements in this version:
- new graphics for enemies, lands, and bosses
- new coins system to unlock new spaceships in the store
- less intrusive advertising
- graphics improvements thanks to a new retrò shader
- new options menu
- new saving system
- more fun thanks to the growing difficulty of each level

comments: New Review because of update: ° I really love this game. I'm hooked. Relaxing yet stimulating. Some levels are easy as cutting through soft butter with lots of delightful bombs and others take several tries to master and need that one devise a strategy and some others are much up to luck. I love that variation: relaxing and stimulating and sometimes a bit frustrating. ° I had finished all the levels of version 2 and then waited for an update which came with new levels and I finished them also about 4 weeks ago. I've opened the game every day since to see if yet an other update came, and yes, yesterday it did and have already finished all levels (that says more about my fanaticism than it says about the difficulty of the game). ° I appreciate the tournament (I topped the monthly yesterday but had dropped 3 steps while I was sleeping and have clawed my way back to the top this evening, but I guess I'll be back down tomorrow. But it's fun! And I got generous daily prizes. ° And I love the new version that even though I again have finished all levels, I can just go on playing thanks to the Level Tower (even if it at 46 repeated a previous level). ° Lovely graphics, good game sound.

Now, the city wants to build a huge supermarket instead. It’s time to burst their bubble!Solve casual match three puzzles to earn tickets and materials. descriptionHTML:
Build a zoo, play with cute animals and solve match 3 puzzles - all in one game!

Switch between the challenge of the match 3 levels, and the joy of welcoming a new furry friend to the zoo you built with your hands.

The Family Zoo was once the gem of the neighborhood. Now, the city wants to build a huge supermarket instead. It’s time to burst their bubble!

Solve casual match three puzzles to earn tickets and materials. Then, restore the zoo and decorate the animal habitats and surrounding gardens.

Meet new and old friends, and work together to make sure all the animals have a place to live. They are counting on you - can you save their home?

Game Features
✿ Swap between match 3 levels and building your own zoo!
✿ Hundreds of delicious and challenging match 3 puzzles
✿ Choose from thousands of decorations to make your family zoo unique!
✿ Interact with exotic and cute animals
✿ Develop your business with stands, cafes and other attractions to draw visitors and earn coins!
✿ Complete quests for more rewards and advancing the story
✿ Make friends with characters that will help you save the zoo
✿ Enhance your fun with exploding watermelons and other wacky boosters

description: The best game for girls this summer now with new super cool activities: boat party, ice slush and dolphin rescue!Join the Sweet Baby Girl Summer Fun club and play the best summer holiday games for kids and toddlers! Spend your summer at the beach near the ocean with Sweet Baby Girl and her friends in a paradise seaside resort. From animal care and ocean clean up to delicious snacks and beauty makeover, these girls have many plans for summer. Have fun exploring 12 amazing activities and play the games that you love!Sweet Baby Girl Summer Fun 2 games for girls:· Girls always take their pet pony on holidays! Take care of this cute little horse: clean up the mess, dirt and spider webs in the stable, shower the pony and make a beautiful hairstyle!· Oh no! Little dolphin is in danger, help him! Rescue the pink dolphin from trash in the ocean, wash it with a sponge and make this precious ocean animal happy again!· Refresh with the best frozen fruit ice slush! Slice, chop and blend fresh fruits with ice, fill the glass with this frozen rainbow color drink and taste it with your summer friends!· Sweet Baby Girl and friends are planning a boat party but the ship is a mess! Clean up, wash, scrub, polish and makeover the boat, paint it pink and gold, and get ready for the best boat party before the sun goes down!· Makeover time! Start in the Shopping Center, mix and match different clothes and colors, and design the perfect boat party outfit!· Visit Hair Salon for a new hairstyle! Wash, dry, comb, cut and curl hair to make the most beautiful haircuts and hairstyles. Dye hair in bright summer colors and decorate with the most fashionable holiday accessories!· It’s a really hot day in the summer resort. Make the most delicious chocolate, vanilla and strawberry frozen ice cream for the girls!· Now the girls are looking for a fancy manicure, learn how to do one! Clean up, cut, and shape the nails, paint them pink and decorate with cute pictures, flowers and stripes!· Sweet Baby Girl and friends are hungry, time to make the most popular holiday snacks - hot dogs! Grill sausages and heat up hot dog buns, add vegetables and sauces, and serve hot dogs to your little clients!· Decorate the fancy villa where the girls will be staying this summer and plan a chill area with chairs and sun umbrella!· More summer fun inside: collect summer postcards and watch summer videos for kids!· Collect coins and use the to unlock new dress up and decoration items!- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -ABOUT TutoTOONS Games for KidsCrafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games cherish the childhood and help children learn the basic life skills through the games they love. description: Mystery Match is a free match game that combines puzzle-solving and jewel-matching fun with a challenging mystery to unravel. Are you up for the challenge?Experience an enchanting, post-Edwardian setting brimming with aristocracy and allure as you take an exciting adventure through glamorous, international locales. Hospital simulator allows to learn how to make vaccination safely, to make operations and save patients, who need urgent and complicated operations. comments: Improved in many ways, but you'll most likely need platinum turtles to earn Super Shredder DNA.  He is faster than a level 71 Splinter and he cheats. He uses all abilities with 0 cool down time, he keeps getting armor, shield, and healing... making winning impossible, unless you are +20 levels higher than him.

It's a fun, easy, addictive game. My ONLY complaint is that even when you buy a card, you don't get to CHOOSE which Character you are getting. If I'm paying $100 for something, I better get to PICK what I'm getting - this game doesn't let you do that.  I also think it takes WAY TOO LONG to evolve Characters, and overall the add-ons are FAR TOO EXPENSIVE for what you are getting, but you don't HAVE TO spend money if you don't want to.

The game is a great game, I love how they added characters from all eras, it sorta reminds me of turtles in time. The only huge downfall of this game is that it's pretty much a pay to play game smh. I've never seen a game that is so money hungry in my life. The $10 monthly subscription  is absurd, the SFX ingame dont work and for 5 bucks more you can play Elder scrolls online that has a ton of content compare to this game.

Subscription should come with better benefits. $10 a month...6 months worth I could've bought an xbox game. Ya know. Pizza re-gen should be a bit quicker. Some people like to grind. And the pizza limitation kills the grind. Good graphics tho, and great characters. But waaaay to hard to acquire the turtles. Big let down on that aspect

Great game just wished Very amazing game especially if you are a turtles fan.. lots of choices with characters.. you can definitely get stronger without having to pay.. you just need to put in the time , and do  do daily event's.. i wish some characters were easier to get;))

After a long battle with the worst customer service i have ever dealt with i will regrettably no longer be playing this game. The game itself is pretty solid but is a money sink. If you need help from the company you may as well quit. The game is a solid 4/5 but the company's attitude and considering you being disposable sadly makes them a 1/10
description: Bros vs Foes!At every turn, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles have thwarted Kraang Prime’s plans to terraform the Earth into Dimension X. What’s an evil overlord to do? Hatch a nefarious new scheme, to create an army of Ultra Mutants! Everywhere, the Kraang have kidnapped mutants - including the Ninja Turtles - for their DNA!With his brothers pulled through a Kraang Dimension X portal, Leonardo must recruit the Ninja Turtles’ allies and foes alike before it’s too late. Hang on to your shells!ORIGINAL NINJAS: Explore the Turtles universe with an All-New Original story. Battle your way through 7 chapters and over 70 stages to take on the baddest of bosses – Shredder, Kraang and more!RESPECT THE SHELL: For a limited-time, play and experience an all-new chapter based on this summer’s blockbuster, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows! When their recon mission goes awry, the Turtles must take on the Foot Clan and favourite bad boys Bebop and Rocksteady! Fight to win and collect these exclusive characters!TURTLE POWER: Help Leonardo as he takes on the Kraang army to save his brothers and fellow mutants. Play alongside Leonardo in a 5-on- 5 battle with your favorite TMNT characters.MUTANT MAYHEM: Collect and level up over 30 TMNT characters! Train them to learn their super sweet moves and build your Turtle-rrific team! Don’t forget to pack your freezer for Ice Cream Kitty!SHRED ALERT: For the very first time, fight the Kraang as a Ninja Turtle friend… or FOE! Collect and play as Tiger Claw, Rocksteady, Bebop, and more.  Create strategic teams and take on the Kraang!FOOD FIGHT:  Collect daily prizes and card packs to enhance your team!WE RUN THIS TOWN:  Fight against the Kraang in the Ninja Turtles’ favorite locations from the TV show, including Dimension X, the sewers and the classic New York City rooftops!Gentlemen, let’s save the world!--Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Legends collects non-personal user data (including aggregated data) and connects with 3rd party social media applications.Please note, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Legends is completely free to play but offers some game items for purchase with real money. descriptionHTML:
Bros vs Foes!

At every turn, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles have thwarted Kraang Prime’s plans to terraform the Earth into Dimension X. What’s an evil overlord to do? Hatch a nefarious new scheme, to create an army of Ultra Mutants! Everywhere, the Kraang have kidnapped mutants - including the Ninja Turtles - for their DNA!

With his brothers pulled through a Kraang Dimension X portal, Leonardo must recruit the Ninja Turtles’ allies and foes alike before it’s too late.

Hang on to your shells!

ORIGINAL NINJAS: Explore the Turtles universe with an All-New Original story. Battle your way through 7 chapters and over 70 stages to take on the baddest of bosses – Shredder, Kraang and more!
RESPECT THE SHELL: For a limited-time, play and experience an all-new chapter based on this summer’s blockbuster, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows! When their recon mission goes awry, the Turtles must take on the Foot Clan and favourite bad boys Bebop and Rocksteady! Fight to win and collect these exclusive characters!
TURTLE POWER: Help Leonardo as he takes on the Kraang army to save his brothers and fellow mutants. Play alongside Leonardo in a 5-on- 5 battle with your favorite TMNT characters.
MUTANT MAYHEM: Collect and level up over 30 TMNT characters! Train them to learn their super sweet moves and build your Turtle-rrific team! Don’t forget to pack your freezer for Ice Cream Kitty!
SHRED ALERT: For the very first time, fight the Kraang as a Ninja Turtle friend… or FOE! Collect and play as Tiger Claw, Rocksteady, Bebop, and more. Create strategic teams and take on the Kraang!
FOOD FIGHT: Collect daily prizes and card packs to enhance your team!
WE RUN THIS TOWN: Fight against the Kraang in the Ninja Turtles’ favorite locations from the TV show, including Dimension X, the sewers and the classic New York City rooftops!

Gentlemen, let’s save the world!

--

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Legends collects non-personal user data (including aggregated data) and connects with 3rd party social media applications.

Please note, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Legends is completely free to play but offers some game items for purchase with real money. If you choose not to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

For users residing in the EU, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Legends may include the use of persistent identifiers for game management purposes and installation of this app constitutes your permission to such usage of persistent identifiers for all users on your device.

400-410 St. Nicolas
Montreal, Quebec, Canada
H2Y 2P5

- Increased the rewards and max capacity of several resources.
- Roster bug fixed: Sort your characters the same way you used to!
- Timer bar bugs and more fixed!
summary: Help Leonardo as he takes on the Kraang to save his brothers and fellow mutants!
title: Ninja Turtles: Legends

comments: Just a heads up. Like I said before you people had this planned. Within this year you have proven your desire. Tell me... when have you played a game that changes like a leaf in the wind? I have never seen any Developer change core functions like you have. Wonder why others used to love this game? It's not the graphics! Summoner Wars and Clash of Clans have you beat! Wonder why? They add and not change everything in just a few days like you have. Like I said before...You reap what you have done.

Actually... I was bored and installed this game and I noticed that my gameplay didn't diminished even after the stall was removed. Actually, now that I think about it, I didn't even use the stall that much. I take it back. I am so sorry for the negativity that I showed. I love this game so much. Btw I didn't spend real money on this game lol.

I love this game so much, but there's always a moment when I enter a room that the fade-in heavily lags. I always thought it was just making the area entry take longer, but it's actually gotten me killed upon entering one of the pvp areas, so it's definitely not normal. Nothing I've changed in the system settings has worked, so I really hope I'm not the only one this is happening to. Also, I think the water elemental magic for the Summoner is bugged: I used it several times in the base and main tower, and it hit in wildly different spots depending on whether I was aiming for an enemy or not. With no enemy in your direct line of sight, the spell always hit directly in front of me, but if I tried to attack a monster with it, it hit in a spot much further ahead instead. comments: At first I liked it till I tried the game where you compete against the big bird. I make a word from letters seen but the bird  makes or from unseen letters and words that are very uncommon. What is a Hexad?  Those letters were not even showing, so how they come out of thin air and then bear what I. Have chosen.  Not fair at all so.changing my 4 stars to 1

This is one of the perfect games I've played,  it is also fun and can pass time very easily because once you start you can't put it down. Also there are not any annoying adverts,  it is also educational for children to learn new words, that's why I've given this game 5 *****. Thanks!!!!

The game is great. I love how much attention went into making this game, it gets a lil boring (for me personally) sometimes.  Had a few glitches, like one time when I made a move, somehow a blue "sapphire" and a blocker square became one square.... which sucked, because I couldn't make a match, that I otherwise could have made.   But I really do love this game.... one of my favorites,  love the challenge level, not too easy, yet not too hard either. One day I'll go back though and try for 3 suns on all levels!! Keep up the great work.

Overall a good game lots of levels. Couple of complaints, sometimes impossible to get 2 or 3 stars regardless how well you do. In "endless mode" computer usually comes up with words I have never heard of before. Player can never win. If player lost a life but wins a future round why can't we regain a life? Not fun if you know you can never win endless mode.
So cute! I love the sound effects and the story of those little languinis. This is not timed so you are able to put it down/look up to do what you need to do.
Just started playing today. So far so good. Other reviews complain of glitches. Nothing yet.🇨🇦

comments: I've played a lot of these games and this is by far one of the worst. Also its not like command and conquer, it the same clash of clans bs that every other game claiming to be like C&C is. Plus it's buggy and already has players that are maxed out the day of release.

A game that through the screenshots, gives the impression it's a brilliant Command and Conquer: Red Alert 2 clone. However, it is not. It's a typical clash of clans style game, the sort that is clogging up the app store. A waste of a free download.

Yea, had no problems with the dl or gameplay. But the base rebuild or movement makes me hate it. Can we have a rebuild screen, so I don't have to move around all 750 walls I have plus my base buildings. Maybe add a base rebuilding depo. That we can change our base from scratch. Put all the buildings"in the cloud" then replace them,

It definitely isn't as advertised. Like others have mentioned, this is more clash of clans / empires and allies in terms of gameplay. Graphically, it's similar to C&C. Not sure if the description is intentionally misleading or a major translation error. Plus, I pre registered and didn't receive General Bradly.

**Caution Download Bait!**  The developers should be ashamed of themselves for misleading everyone like this. This was such a DISAPPOINTMENT. They purposely put one line in that they knew would draw in people's attention. "brings a Red Alert style experience to your mobile phone". This is very misleading, and it is nothing like RA. If you are looking for a "clans" type game with RA sounds, then General Order is for you. If you are looking for commanding troops, tanks, jets, and ships with a command box, and literally clicking on the location, or enemies and traversing through the fog of war, then sorry to tell you but keep hoping and praying for the day to come..... I am seriously thinking about developing one myself after this big let down...
I pre registered and I love the game so far. Currently I'm level 32. I only have one problem, if someone hits a base for revenge I think their base should teleport in the area so you can hit back.

descriptionHTML:
Brand new word search game: Word Search Emoji. Improve your English vocabulary as well as having fun while trying to find over 1100 picture words in 23 different categories.

Mark the hidden words that are placed up, down, left, right and diagonally and complete the levels. There are 3 difficulty levels in our word search game; easy, medium and hard. Challenge yourself and increase your English spelling with classic, timed and sequential game modes.

You can have hours of fun with Word Search Emoji; letter puzzle and picture word game while improving your brain and puzzle solving skills.

• EXPAND YOUR ENGLISH VOCABULARY
In our Word Search Emoji game, each word is accompanied with an emoji. These emojis help you to learn the meanings of words, memorize their spellings and expand your English vocabulary while you are having fun.

• 23 DIFFERENT CATEGORIES
Word Search Emoji is suitable for both children and adults. There are over 1100 words in 23 different categories:

- Animals
- Art
- Body and Gestures
- Buildings
- Business and Finance
- Clothing and Accessories
- Colors
- Communication
- Countries
- Education
- Emojis
- Family and Habits
- Fruits and Foods
- Geography
- Hobby and Fun
- Professions
- Religion
- Sports
- Supernatural
- Symbols
- Tools and Weapons
- Transportation
- Vegetables and Plants

• DIFFICULTY LEVELS
- Easy: 6x6 box size, up to 6 words, maximum 5 letters long
- Medium: 8X8 box size, up to 12 words, maximum 7 letters long
- Difficult: 14x14 box size, up to 20 words, maximum 14 letters long

• GAME MODES:
- Classic: Classic word search mode
- Timed: Word search game with easy (1.5 minutes), medium (4 minutes) and hard (10 minutes) difficulty modes. When you find a word in timed game mode, you gain 2, 5, and 10 seconds of additional time.
- Sequential: You need to find each word sequentially. This makes the game even more difficult.

• EDUCATIONAL AND IMPROVES BRAIN SKILLS
Experience a brand new gaming experience with Word Search Emoji, a classic brain game for all ages. There are thousands of different level variations thanks to automatically created sections. Find hidden words and improve yourself while you are having fun!

• IMPROVE YOUR ENGLISH
Each word is accompanied with an emoji that describes the meaning of the word. These emojis help you to learn the spellings of these words. They make it easier to memorize the meanings of English words. Every time you play random words are shown. More than 1100 words and emojis help you to enjoy a completely different game experience.

Finish all categories in all difficulty levels, complete the game and learn more while having fun.

• GAME BUTTONS:
- EASY: Easy difficulty level
- MEDIUM: Medium difficulty level
- HARD: Hard difficulty level

- CLASSIC: Classic game mode
- TIMED: Timed game mode
- SEQUENTIAL: Sequential game mode

• OPTIMIZED FOR ANDROID & GOOGLE PLAY

comments: Can u guys give some information about the loot we got? It's iritating . Then what about selling wares and equipement? Where da hell our source of money.. All over is good so far Thank you for your har work!

Like the game but would be better if resources would come back after a while, or you didn't loose your inventory when you died. Cant play for longer than two mins without dying again looking for wood. No axe, no pick, no wood.....  get killed. Lol

It was very promising game. New update turns game very very hard and unbalanced. To much equipment cost for too little kill reward. Already spent money. But now without real money it is so difficult. No fighting chance at all. Please fix it

This COULD be a great game, but it's a very much unbalanced. Your resources on you area NEVER grow back, so you must travel... I get why that is, but it takes 10-30 minutes, unless of course you want to use energy. You get 100 energy and it takes too much energy to fast travel at the pace that energy is replenished. If you can get around that, and build a few items, tools, weapons, etc. It seems like the game finally gets going but if you die from the 5-10 attackers, you lose ALL of your stuff on you. Everything I've mentioned can of course be fixed by spending a TON of money, but beware, everything has durabilty, and once broken will disappear. So you will always be spending money. CAN'T THERE BE ONE OF THESE GAMES THAT AREN'T MADE OUT OF COMPLETE GREED?
I really like it, but such a slow start, after the initial offering of goodies i just stumble along with constant death, no weapon, lose my bag every death. Very frustrating.
Great game, wish there was something to gain more energy, and a hp, or energy lvl cap off, max hp should go up like 2hp per lvl gained. Idk more stats that the player can tweak for gameplay
description: Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!● EXPLORE NEW LANDSExplore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors’ castles to obtain the most valuable resources.● LEARN CRAFTINGBuild workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands’ most dangerous inhabitants.● IMPROVE YOUR CASTLEBuild a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don’t forget to explore your enemies’ territory to collect valuable loot.● DEFEAT ENEMIESMorning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!● SADDLE YOUR HORSEBuild a stable and don’t miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.● OVERCOME HARDSHIPLife in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.● BEFRIEND THE RAVENSBuild a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.● JOIN A CLANA clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.● PREPARE FOR THE NIGHTWhen night descends, darkness floods the world, and you’ll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.● RECEIVE REWARDSYou may feel alone, but you are not. There’s always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that’s the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.● SOLVE THE MYSTERYSearch for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire’s ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.
descriptionHTML:
Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!

● EXPLORE NEW LANDS

Explore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors’ castles to obtain the most valuable resources.

● LEARN CRAFTING

Build workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands’ most dangerous inhabitants.

● IMPROVE YOUR CASTLE

Build a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don’t forget to explore your enemies’ territory to collect valuable loot.

● DEFEAT ENEMIES

Morning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!

● SADDLE YOUR HORSE

Build a stable and don’t miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.

● OVERCOME HARDSHIP

Life in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.

● BEFRIEND THE RAVENS

Build a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.

● JOIN A CLAN

A clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.

● PREPARE FOR THE NIGHT

When night descends, darkness floods the world, and you’ll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.

● RECEIVE REWARDS

You may feel alone, but you are not. There’s always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that’s the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.

● SOLVE THE MYSTERY

Search for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire’s ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.


Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!

Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.

comments: Great time killer, pretty cheap to remove adds and get more continues. Devs are adding more stuff all the time. One thing, please please please let us select like 3 knives as favourites just because having just one or random is a bit lacking.  Nice simple game though.

I bought the app to get rid of the annoying ads. However, they are still there and nothing has changed. Emailed the developer and never got a reply. It's a fun game but customer support seems to be lacking. Will be requesting a refund.

I love the game, but you need to create more game modes. Yeah sure the bosses are nice and all but they get really boring after playing them over and over and over again. You need to liven up your game with different game modes/types to keep people coming back for more knife madness!

Game lags in the most critical moments, I've lost so many times just because of lag that happens unexpected. Throws the knife into the next knife even if there is plenty of space. Fix that and I will give for sure 5 star rating.

Developers please initialize your sounds before you start playing.  I say this because  when you play for the first time after starting up the app, everything you hear a new sound the app freezes and lags for a moment.  If you could fix this that would be very nice

The game is great at all but when I tap to deploy a knife the game is lagging hard and I miss everytime because this bug or something. I don't think it's cause' my phone. Fix this because it's so annoying. Again... The game is great but still having some bugs.

description: The most expecting MMORPG of 2017!“Zeon” is a greater classic MMORPG game ever with cute style which cost millions dollars to present. It had archived new milestone in mobile game industry by providing high definition gameplay, fascinating character skills and variety of interactive dungeon mode. To protect the land against Lord of Sin, we are seeking for brave warriors to join our alliance in battlefield. Let’s join our alliance and experience the thrilling and mysterious adventure together.[Game Characteristics]* New milestone in mobile game communityAs a mobile online game, “Zeon” had put much of effort into social communication. Friends system included intimacy, enemy and blacklist. From here, it was extended to couple, apprentice, team, guild, clan and other social community. Players who were staying far away from each other able to communicate immediately and most important you can make friends from all over the world. Besides, we had provided voice chat feature in game and it made the communication between players more convenient. * Hot Blooded PKIn “Zeon”, we have various kind of real time PK mode such as Colosseum, Royal War, Sin Battlefield, Camp war and so on. Are you excited with these activities? Let’s join us now!* Creative Pet CultivationThere are more than 10 types of pets in “Zeon”. Cute or cool pets are up to your choice. You can swap your dream pet anytime during the game because it will not influence your total CP at all. Other than common pet level up, you can boost the pet potential by using pets’ soul or giving favorite gift to pet.* New Interesting GameplayMost popular gameplay already released in our “Zeon”. In addition, we had created some special mode for players. It is such a great game worth a try.* Red Packets was Available Any recharge in this game will obtain a chance to gift red packet to everybody in the server. This action is free of charge and will not consume any diamond or item. Do not miss this chance to grab it when you received the relevant announcement in the game.--------------------------------------------------------------------------If you have any suggestion or problem, welcome to contact us.Follow our Facebook fan page for more further news!Facebook：www.facebook.com/eyouzeonInstagram:  eyougame_zeonEmail：zeon_support@eyougame.com
descriptionHTML:
The most expecting MMORPG of 2017!

“Zeon” is a greater classic MMORPG game ever with cute style which cost millions dollars to present. It had archived new milestone in mobile game industry by providing high definition gameplay, fascinating character skills and variety of interactive dungeon mode. To protect the land against Lord of Sin, we are seeking for brave warriors to join our alliance in battlefield. Let’s join our alliance and experience the thrilling and mysterious adventure together.

[Game Characteristics]
* New milestone in mobile game community
As a mobile online game, “Zeon” had put much of effort into social communication. Friends system included intimacy, enemy and blacklist. From here, it was extended to couple, apprentice, team, guild, clan and other social community. Players who were staying far away from each other able to communicate immediately and most important you can make friends from all over the world. Besides, we had provided voice chat feature in game and it made the communication between players more convenient.

* Hot Blooded PK
In “Zeon”, we have various kind of real time PK mode such as Colosseum, Royal War, Sin Battlefield, Camp war and so on. Are you excited with these activities? Let’s join us now!

* Creative Pet Cultivation
There are more than 10 types of pets in “Zeon”. Cute or cool pets are up to your choice. You can swap your dream pet anytime during the game because it will not influence your total CP at all. Other than common pet level up, you can boost the pet potential by using pets’ soul or giving favorite gift to pet.

* New Interesting Gameplay
Most popular gameplay already released in our “Zeon”. In addition, we had created some special mode for players. It is such a great game worth a try.

* Red Packets was Available
Any recharge in this game will obtain a chance to gift red packet to everybody in the server. This action is free of charge and will not consume any diamond or item. Do not miss this chance to grab it when you received the relevant announcement in the game.


--------------------------------------------------------------------------
If you have any suggestion or problem, welcome to contact us.
Follow our Facebook fan page for more further news!
Facebook：www.facebook.com/eyouzeon
Instagram: eyougame_zeon
Email：zeon_support@eyougame.com
developerAddress: 05-06, Paya Lebar Square, 60 Paya Lebar Road, Singapore 409051
summary: Zeon-The most expecting MMORPG of 2017!
title: Zeon

The game has revolutionary gameplay with new elements, new system, and new battle modes. It will surely change the way you play ARPG. Enjoy “Musou Glory” with the stunning visual and exhilarating gameplay!

- Epic Dungeon Crawling Gameplay
The game development team has carefully collected the opinions from world renowned game reviewers and thousands of gamers. They have worked hard to craft the dungeon crawling system which specialized in the multiplayer element. The overall game design is an all-rounded one, where hardcore gamers, as well as casual players will find a perfect gaming style that suits them!

The game consists of numerous PvE and PvP gameplay such as brawl, team battle, clan war, arena, and many more. Be a lone wolf, or a team player while playing the game. Battle freely, anytime, anywhere!

description: Survival: Prison EscapeYou were sentenced 10 years imprisonment in a horrible prison. Break out & escape the jail to chase your freedom in this free to play prison escape action adventure game!The jail prison you are sent to is located outside the City in the woods for a crime you never committed. It’s a high security prison, a jail just like Alcatraz. The corrupt warden has assigned police sniper shooters, police security guards, k9 dogs, cops patrol cars, cctv cameras etc to keep an eye on you but you know you don’t belong here with all the criminals. It’s time for you to plan & break out of this jail in order to get your freedom again. In order to run away from this high security Alcatraz like jail you befriended other criminals & prisoners which helped you in blending in & collecting the information as well as the resources required.The Police warden has the maximum security like alcatraz in here and escaping from the Jail guards only seems to be a dream. But to breakout is your only mission now. In order to successfully break out of the jail you’ll have to devise a grand & great plan. The police sniper shooters & polices guards are equipped with modern weapons & guns which means they won’t hesitate to shoot you if you try to run away. It’s not just a jail break it’s a war for survival. You’ll have to move stealthy & use your stealth skills throughout this special mission in order to survive. Stealth, fighting & gun shooting is what you’ll need the most to survive & break out of here. Kill the police guards before they shoot, fight & kill you & pick up their modern weapons & guns to combat back. Strike hard & counter their attacks because that’s what your success depends on. You’ll face a lot of shooting during your escape break out mission so be ready to aim & shoot accurately & swiftly. Use melee weapons or hand to hand combat where necessary. Get ready to execute your grand prison escape plan by killing the corrupt police men who are trying to stop you. You are being watched through Cameras and security is all over. Police is equipped with all sort of modern weapons, guns & they can also call the helicopters for the search of escaped prisoners. So run for your life and Survive the Prison. Immersive environment and real life sound effects would not let you leave this game ever!Please follow us:facebook: https://www.facebook.com/topactiongames2015twitter: https://twitter.com/TAG2015_STUDIOSPS. We work hard to ensure that our games run properly on every major android phone and tablet. If however you encounter any issue which doesn't let you enjoy our games, please report it to topactiongames2015@gmail.comTop Action Games Team
descriptionHTML:
Survival: Prison Escape

You were sentenced 10 years imprisonment in a horrible prison. Break out & escape the jail to chase your freedom in this free to play prison escape action adventure game!

The jail prison you are sent to is located outside the City in the woods for a crime you never committed. It’s a high security prison, a jail just like Alcatraz. The corrupt warden has assigned police sniper shooters, police security guards, k9 dogs, cops patrol cars, cctv cameras etc to keep an eye on you but you know you don’t belong here with all the criminals. It’s time for you to plan & break out of this jail in order to get your freedom again. In order to run away from this high security Alcatraz like jail you befriended other criminals & prisoners which helped you in blending in & collecting the information as well as the resources required.

The Police warden has the maximum security like alcatraz in here and escaping from the Jail guards only seems to be a dream. But to breakout is your only mission now. In order to successfully break out of the jail you’ll have to devise a grand & great plan.

The police sniper shooters & polices guards are equipped with modern weapons & guns which means they won’t hesitate to shoot you if you try to run away. It’s not just a jail break it’s a war for survival. You’ll have to move stealthy & use your stealth skills throughout this special mission in order to survive. Stealth, fighting & gun shooting is what you’ll need the most to survive & break out of here. Kill the police guards before they shoot, fight & kill you & pick up their modern weapons & guns to combat back. Strike hard & counter their attacks because that’s what your success depends on. You’ll face a lot of shooting during your escape break out mission so be ready to aim & shoot accurately & swiftly. Use melee weapons or hand to hand combat where necessary. Get ready to execute your grand prison escape plan by killing the corrupt police men who are trying to stop you. You are being watched through Cameras and security is all over. Police is equipped with all sort of modern weapons, guns & they can also call the helicopters for the search of escaped prisoners. So run for your life and Survive the Prison.

Immersive environment and real life sound effects would not let you leave this game ever!

Well, the graphics are good, in fact probably over the top for this sort of game. It would be better if more effort was put in making the controls better, and not so much In the graphics. Also it takes too much to unlock new stuff. It would not be so bad if I didn't feel like everywhere I turn I was told I couldn't do anything. It gets real old making the same recipie over, and over. That is boring! And half the stuff I don't even know what the purpose is! Like the happy food, or whatever it is. So... Mehr, it is OK I guess, if you like that sort of thing.

Amazing it reminds me of my old Wii game only with more mini games which is great! A little bit disappointing at the amount of recipes and that you have to pay to make something new. Still great and easy to get coins but its tedious playing the same 5 recipes. At least it has the mini games.

descriptionHTML:
A family-friendly cooking game loved worldwide!

[You'll learn to love cooking!]
Chop, bake, stew...
Cook tasty meals with easy touch controls!
Try out this unique cooking game.
The yummy food you'll create will definitely make you hungry!

▼Let's Cook!
Cook food by playing fun mini games. More than 30 kinds of recipes are waiting for you. Do your best, Special Chef!

▼Happy Village is open!
Have fun harvesting in Happy Village!

▼Happy Fishing!
Go fishing to get ingredients for cooking!

▼Happy Restaurant!
Serve delicious dishes to guests in your very own restaurant. Offer guests a variety of meals by using different ingredients and expand your restaurant!

▼Game Plaza!
Play non-cooking games like "Help out," "Play Shopkeeper," and "Exercise your brain." More than 30 kinds of mini games are waiting for you. Aim to get high scores!

▼Challenge Ranking!
Compete in weekly events for the best scores! Join the global rankings!

▼Other Ways to Have Fun
-Decorate the kitchen with various items.
-Make surprise dishes by combining 2 recipes.
-Watch realistic cooking videos for supported recipes.
-Watch an animated video of Mama's fun daily life.
-Easily share videos of your gameplay to the world.

[Game Features]
With its intuitive controls, both children and adults can enjoy the game. Also, even if you make mistakes there are no game overs, so everyone can complete dishes. Furthermore, children who play may develop an interest in cooking.

[Recommended Setup]
Android OS 4.1 or later.
**Game may not be playable on certain devices even if the above conditions are met.

**By downloading this game, you are accepting its User Agreement.
http://www.ofcr.co.jp/APP_CookingMama/en/privacypolicy.html

English,French,German,Italian,Spanish,Dutch,Russian,Portuguese,Polish,Czech,Turkish,Japanese,Korean,Simplified Chinese,Traditional Chinese,Indonesian,Filipino,Malay,Thai,Vietnamese,Hindi,Spanish-mexico,Portugues brasileiro,Arabic,Persian

descriptionHTML:
Collect hundreds of cute and AWESOME pokemons as you step inside a world full of adventure, battles, quests, dark quests and PVP!

Are you ready to battle?

Giant Battles
-Play giant battles!
-Combine elements to destroy your opponents!

Collect Pokemons
-Collect and catch over 200+ monsters through adventures, PvP, Raids and Dark Quests!
-Collect all 6 elements - Fire, Water, Earth, Thunder, Dark and Light!

Evolve your Pokemons
-Evolve and boost your pokemon!
-Teach and train your pokemon to create stronger monsters!
-Fuse together monsters to create and unlock a better one!
-Revive your pokemons and unleash their optimum performance!

Challenges
-Adventure Mode (Normal & Elite): Gain various loot items and pokemons!
-PvP Mode: Compete with others to earn rewards!
-Special Quest: Earn giant rewards each day!
-Dark Quest: Challenge yourself in this marathon tournament!
-Guild Raid: Cooperate with your guild to earn rare loot items!

Join a Guild
-Join a Guild and become the best guild master!
-Compete with other guilds !
-Raise Deity with your guild mates and use it to help you on Special Events!

description: Now you will fight against squad of suicide armored robots for the justice in Crime City! Your superhero is the great avenger who can fly, jump and throw up a rope. A funny comics hero returns. We are glad to present you a new simulator of a superhero, in which you have to fight super villains and protect the city. Pump your hero, use the steep combinations of super-attacks, perform missions and defeat the villains. You are waiting for exciting fights and non-stop action.Mutants entered the city and no one can stop them except you. Use your agility and skill to defeat them. Super heroes can do everything. You can fight swords, shoot weapons, climb walls and even fly.Open world and an exciting storyline will not let you get bored. The perfect artificial intellect of enemies will challenge, and the realistic behavior of people and machines will completely immerse you in the atmosphere of a superhero city.

description: ABC Animals is the lite version of an educational game illustrated with cute cartoons by pro book’s illustrator. Our ultimate goal was to produce a game that would call your kids to learn English alphabet in an easy and funny way. Every letter is illustrated with an animal illustration making sure kids understand it well.   On top of that, every animal speaks with unique sound as you click it (it's voiced by schoolgirl). The game has two different scenes enabling you to pick the one that works better for your kid.   This application is completely ads-free. Parents can be sure nothing don’t disturb while learning!  ABC Animals is compatible with any Android device you will be running it whether it's a smartphone, tablet or Android TV

comments: I am so glad I tried this game. I was looking for something different then the same old cooking and farming match 3 games and found this on Facebook and so thought I would give it a try. I am so glad I did. I have been playing for a few days now and it's my favorite game. It feels different then the normal Match 3 since it feels like I have a story line, plus I have other things I am doing. I like that. I like the theme of it as well. Also, so far it doesn't seem like they make it impossible to get past levels the higher you get like some games do.  A+ so far.  I just can't put it down! Only thing I wish they didn't do is have so few lives. I hate when games limit us and basically tell us that they only want us to play their game for a little bit at a time.  I will always find that stupid.  I could find an even better game while I take a break from your game because you limit how long I play with barely any lives. Would give 5 stars if they wouldn't give such a limited amount of lives.
I can't seem to be able to change the mode like it says to do with an orange button. If I could do that too would rate it higher. All in all it's a decent game.
Too few lives and the levels are nearly impossible to beat without buying powet-ups.  It's not worth it.

It seems that I get to a point of winning the board, and you move your piece, and it goes in a different direction and makes you end up using your rubies, or spend money to get more in order to finish. And it's always down to one square in order to win...not happy.
Really fun game with nice graphics and charming story. I'm addicted already!
Love it, very addicting game play but frustrating when you can't get what you need lol

description: Get the GAME OF THE YEAR award-winning puzzler! Help Swampy by guiding water to his broken shower. Each level is a challenging physics-based puzzle with amazing life-like mechanics. Cut through dirt and guide fresh water, dirty water, toxic water, steam, and ooze through increasingly challenging scenarios! Every drop counts! In this FREE version, play 15+ challenging puzzles featuring Swampy! Want more levels? Get the full version and play up to 500 amazing puzzles featuring Allie, Cranky, Mystery Duck and MORE! Full Version Features:• Original Stories & Characters – Play through 4 unique stories featuring Swampy, Allie, Cranky and Mystery Duck. That’s over 500 amazing puzzles!• Innovative Mechanic – See water in various forms and use your creativity to solve the puzzles – totally stimulating!• Collectibles, Challenges, and Bonus Levels – Collect special items uniquely designed for each character and complete cool challenges to unlock bonus levels! “Tri-Duck” each level for ultimate bragging rights!• Brand New Levels Every Week – Hurry and play before they expire, and be sure to use ‘Photo Finish’ to share how you beat the new levels! SWAMPY’S STORY Swampy the Alligator lives in the sewers under the city. He’s a little different from the other alligators – he’s curious, friendly, and loves taking a nice long shower after a hard day at work. But there’s trouble with the pipes and Swampy needs your help getting water to his shower! Visit Facebook.com/DisneyMobileGames for cool game tips, news and more!Before you download this app, please consider that this app includes advertising, some of which may be targeted to your interests. descriptionHTML:
Get the GAME OF THE YEAR award-winning puzzler!

Help Swampy by guiding water to his broken shower. Each level is a challenging physics-based puzzle with amazing life-like mechanics. Cut through dirt and guide fresh water, dirty water, toxic water, steam, and ooze through increasingly challenging scenarios! Every drop counts!

In this FREE version, play 15+ challenging puzzles featuring Swampy! Want more levels? Get the full version and play up to 500 amazing puzzles featuring Allie, Cranky, Mystery Duck and MORE!

Full Version Features:
• Original Stories & Characters – Play through 4 unique stories featuring Swampy, Allie, Cranky and Mystery Duck. That’s over 500 amazing puzzles!
• Innovative Mechanic – See water in various forms and use your creativity to solve the puzzles – totally stimulating!
• Collectibles, Challenges, and Bonus Levels – Collect special items uniquely designed for each character and complete cool challenges to unlock bonus levels! “Tri-Duck” each level for ultimate bragging rights!
• Brand New Levels Every Week – Hurry and play before they expire, and be sure to use ‘Photo Finish’ to share how you beat the new levels!

SWAMPY’S STORY
Swampy the Alligator lives in the sewers under the city. He’s a little different from the other alligators – he’s curious, friendly, and loves taking a nice long shower after a hard day at work. But there’s trouble with the pipes and Swampy needs your help getting water to his shower!

descriptionHTML:
¿Estás cansado de interfaces anticuadas de crucigramas?
¿Quieres disfrutar de una experiencia totalmente nueva de puzles de palabras?
¡Ahora puedes descargar Palabras Cruz y jugar en TABLEROS GRATIS!

Palabras Cruz es un juego de crucigramas creativo que puede inspirar tu pasión por desafíos mentales. Incluye todo lo principal de juegos de formación de palabras para hacerte sentir totalmente ADICTIVO y ENTRETENIDO.

➤ Accesible y Fácil de Jugar: Puedes arrastrar las letras fácilmente para formar una palabra escondida específica. Es fácil jugar y divertido de dominar para todos.

➤ Bonus Sorprendente: Inicia sesión cada día y consigue bonus diario. También conseguirás monedas después de encontrar Palabras Extra que no estén presentes en el tablero del crucigrama.

➤ Más de 1.000 Desafíos Apasionantes: Empieza fácil y se vuelve exigente rápidamente. Y puedes comprobar tus límites de las palabras que conoces. Más niveles por llegar.
